channel.title: I have a few questions
channel.description:
I am basing my server off of Mezzyscape and i dont want "Chris" to be the all-time owner.
Here they are:
1. How can i change it to where i am the owner? 2. How can i change the text on the login welcome sreen? 3. How can i make it so when i drop an item, it is able to be either picked up by me, have it w8 awhile and then have it disappear from my view and appear for ALL the other players?
If you can answer them that would be great!
Thnks,
Tom

item.title: I have a few questions
item.dc:creator: @Sparkslasher Sparkslasher
item.description:
@Sparkslasher wrote:

Ok, I have my own server, so I will tell you.

  1. Go into your character file and put where it says ‘player rights’ a 3.
  2. Go into client.java, do CTRL+F and put in ‘Chris’, ‘Mezzyscape’ and change what you find.
  3. That already does that…

Read full topic

item.title: I have a few questions
item.dc:creator: @Tom8004 Tom8004
item.description:
@Tom8004 wrote:

ok ty… i will reply back here if i get it working

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  1. Character file.
  2. initialize() method in the client class.
  3. Not sure which method/packet handles this.

item.title: I have a few questions
item.dc:creator: @Justin3 Justin_
item.description:
@Justin3 wrote:

I’m not that familiar with “MezzyScape”. Is it a 508+?

If it is:

Go into login.java and search, “Chris”. Change it with your username.
I haven’t used a 508 in a long time so I forgot where you change the login screen

Read full topic

item.title: I have a few questions

item.description:

I am basing my server off of Mezzyscape and i dont want “Chris” to be the all-time owner.

Here they are:

  2. How can i change the text on the login welcome sreen?
  3. How can i make it so when i drop an item, it is able to be either picked up by me, have it w8 awhile and then have it disappear from my view and appear for ALL the other players?

Tom
